inclusion.criterion: Moderate AS with AVA between 1-1.4cm2, and AVMG<40 millimetres of Mercury (mmHg);
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Cardiac related symptoms; shortness of breath, chest pain or syncope.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to exercise and undertake pharmacological stress, ie previously known
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe aortic or mitral regurgitation or severe mitral stenosis;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant pulmonary disease like severe (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) or pulmonary fibrosis;
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%, and had biatrial enlargement.
